text: Spurs 2-1 Everton. @R9Soldado ended a run of 627 minutes without a #BPL goal. Report: http://t.co/9uMezwwT3o http://t.co/uTDd5w4SgC

#BPLlive is coming to Mumbai, 13-14 Dec. More than 30,000 fans enjoyed the inaugural event in Johannesburg
https://t.co/6WgmoKAVOo
Here are the Matchweek 14 fixtures in the #BPL - six on Tuesday and four more on Wednesday... http://t.co/E0ZOrRDEsu
Gabby Agbonlahor has scored against 32 of his 34 #BPL opponents, but has yet to net against @CPFC #CRYAVL http://t.co/2DIBrxl1s9
Chinese Super League heads visit the Premier League and its clubs to learn best practices: http://t.co/1pQTv0VN1H http://t.co/pkMQZttu0a
TEAM NEWS @wbaofficial replace Sebastien Pocognoli and Youssouf Mulumbu with Chris Baird and Victor Anichebe #WBAWHU
PHOTO @fellainiM celebrates his first @ManUtd goal at Old Trafford. The hosts lead Stoke 1-0 after 31 mins #MUNSTK http://t.co/0yWYey313R

HALF-TIME #BPL SCORES
West Brom 1-2 West Ham
Palace 0-1 Villa
GOAL Swansea 1-0 QPR (78 mins) Ki Sung-Yueng breaks the deadlock with a precise finish off the far post from Bony's pass #SWAQPR
Louis van Gaal: "I am always more impressed by our performance than our result, I am a crazy coach." #MUNSTK http://t.co/Yl3Zga5DaB
Swansea 2-0 QPR. Swans leave it late but move up to 6th. Report: http://t.co/i6bAII3Mre http://t.co/WQqTmdnsek
Man Utd 2-1 Stoke: Only Wayne Rooney (5) has more #BPL goals this season for @ManUtd than @juanmata8 (4) #MUNSTK http://t.co/uoDvOPyFMu
Chelsea v Spurs: @chelseafc have not lost a #BPL home match to @SpursOfficial. Preview: http://t.co/UY7SPF5Kij http://t.co/nmMJMw5xrQ
TEAM NEWS Oxlade-Chamberlain comes in for Giroud for @Arsenal; Long & Cork replace Mane & Schneiderlin for @SouthamptonFC #ARSSOU
GOAL Sunderland 1-1 Man City (21 mins) Aguero equalises within 2 minutes, beating his marker and smashing the shot past Pantillimon #SUNMCI
PHOTO Lukaku celebrates his 6th #BPL goal of the season, which still separates Everton and Hull (51 mins) #EVEHUL http://t.co/NaogftBvEa
FULL-TIME Sunderland 1-4 Man City. Aguero stars as City end their Stadium of Light hoodoo #SUNMCI http://t.co/BcFIW3mRnO
Poyet: “We got ahead but then a bit of quality from someone in great form like Aguero and the game changed." #SUNMCI http://t.co/xuR1iCAx2d

#BPL TOP SCORERS
14 - Sergio Aguero 
11 - Diego Costa
9 - Alexis Sanchez
7 - Saido Berahino, Charlie Austin http://t.co/VYjopokAcQ
BARCLAYS GOLDEN BOOT @aguerosergiokun leads the race - but will the striker still be on top at the end of the season? http://t.co/Fqhn9A20P5
DREAM TEAM @aguerosergiokun is the only player with over 100 #FPL points this term. Can you afford to leave him out? http://t.co/FH005dk9df
.@chazaustin9 has 4 goals in his last 3 #BPL home matches... He looks for more against @BurnleyOfficial #QPRBUR http://t.co/quzcaKZ9Mm
#FootballRemembers week begins on Saturday. See how you can create "A Moment in History": http://t.co/gELva2ooTz http://t.co/X0nq6CDMbq
STAT PACK Everton have won 17 of their 34 #BPL meetings with Man City. See how all the numbers stack up: http://t.co/klep7HErl3 #MCIEVE
TEAM NEWS Two changes for @chelseafc, with Jon Obi Mikel in for Nemanja Matic and Diego Costa replacing Didier Drogba #NEWCHE
SUB @NUFC make a second change on 53 minutes as @CissePapiss comes on to replace @RemyCabella. 0-0 at St James's Park #NEWCHE
FULL-TIME Newcastle 2-1 Chelsea. Cisse strikes twice as @NUFC become the first #BPL team to beat Chelsea this season http://t.co/FJwX3zS9qA
GOAL Stoke 1-0 Arsenal (1 min). The hosts are in front after 19 seconds through Peter Crouch, who finishes from close range #STKARS
#BPL clubs have been marking #FootballRemembers around the country. We'll RT a selection of their pictures... http://t.co/gELva2ooTz
Less than 10 minutes to go at Anfield and it's still Liverpool 0-0 Sunderland. Will there be any late drama? #LIVSUN http://t.co/QltI0CvxT7
"That's probably the best 45 minutes I've been involved in since I've been at Stoke" - @petercrouch on STK 3-2 ARS http://t.co/wo5vghq8OC
.@stokecity manager Mark Hughes: "We were outstanding. We were good value for the 3-0 lead at half-time" #STKARS http://t.co/nMAESPn1eE
.@YayaToure: "We knew about Chelsea. I think all the team was thinking about this opportunity [to close the gap]" http://t.co/ZeWlvTDSX8
WATCH Harry Redknapp on a vital 2-0 victory: "These wins are massive for us because we've got to stay in the group." http://t.co/A6O0fnVckw
Liverpool 0-0 Sunderland. A point apiece after a tense draw at Anfield - full report: http://t.co/vDXYo8FNEs http://t.co/WkTCiaK9Xj
#FootballRemembers this weekend. Learn more: http://t.co/KLYDD4zY1b http://t.co/L11FOkkIHY
KICK-OFF @SwansOfficial get us under way at the Boleyn Ground... #WHUSWA
WOODWORK Wilfried Bony's shot from the edge of the area rattles the crossbar on 60 minutes. West Ham 1-1 Swansea #WHUSWA
.@AndyTCarroll: "Until you score you're not definitely back and two goals today means a great deal." #WHUSWA http://t.co/K6vJ58Z6NA
HALF-TIME Aston Villa 1-1 Leicester. It's level at the break after Clark cancels out Ulloa's opener #AVLLEI http://t.co/knMBuIndSV
Leicester's @kschmeichel1: "We haven't quite adjusted to the Premier League yet. We have to keep our belief." #AVLLEI http://t.co/B5U69Pe0lU
